name: Drift Mile
description:
Hypercasual racing game with drift mechanics, that lets players gradually upgrade their vehicle as they improve skills.

Details:
The game supports both touch and keyboard controls, and it's optimized for fast loading and smooth performance on HTML5 platforms. Works great on Android and Windows devices, but there may be issues on iOS due to Apple's limitations. Fullscreen support for different screen ratios will not be available during the demo and will be added afterwards.

Controls for PC:
[A] & [D] or arrow keys — Steering
[R] — Restart
[Space] — Play

Credits:
Car models from sketchfab.com
Sounds from zapsplat.com
Sprites from GUI PRO kit
Everything else is by me: Eloren

Submission for Gameflip Game Jam 2023
